Polysphere Class¶

class polysphere.Polysphere.Polysphere¶

A class to manage the Polysphere puzzle board, pieces, and solution generation.

Attributes:

pieces (dict): A dictionary containing the different puzzle pieces. pieces_left (dict): A copy of pieces indicating which pieces are yet to be placed. board_size (tuple): The dimensions of the puzzle board. board (list): The puzzle board grid. piece_positions (dict): A dictionary tracking the positions of placed pieces. all_solutions_partial_config (list): Stores solutions for partial configurations.

flip_piece(piece_key)¶

Flip the piece horizontally and store it in the board.

Args:

piece_key (str): The key of the piece.

Returns:

bool: True if flipped successfully, False otherwise.

is_board_empty()¶

Checks if no pieces are placed on board.

Returns:

bool: True if the board is empty, False otherwise.

is_board_filled()¶

Checks if all pieces have been placed on the board.

Returns:

bool: True if the board is filled, False otherwise.

is_valid_placement(positions)¶

Checks if piece position to be plaecd is not out of boards and no other pieces are placed in same position.

Args:

positions (list): List of (row, col) tuples where the piece is to be placed.

Returns:

bool: True if valid placemenet, False otherwise.

place_piece(piece_key, positions)¶

Places a piece on the board at specified positions if valid.

Args:

piece_key (str): The key of the piece. positions (list): List of (row, col) tuples where the piece should be placed.

Returns:

bool: True if the piece was successfully placed, False otherwise.

remove_piece(piece_key)¶

Remove a piece from the board.

Args:

piece_key (str): The key of the piece.

Returns:

bool: True if the piece was successfully removed, False otherwise.

reset_board()¶

Resets all the class attributes.

rotate_piece(piece_key)¶

Rotates the piece 90 degrees and store it in the board.

Args:

piece_key (str): The key of the piece.

Returns:

bool: True if rotated successfully, False otherwise.

solveAllPartialConfig()¶

Gets all solutions for the current board and stores it in self.all_solutions_partial_config attribute.

Returns:

bool: True if solved successfully, False is no solutions found.

solvePartialConfig()¶

Gets a solution for the current board and stores it in self.board attribute.

Returns:

bool: True if solved successfully, False is no solutions found.
